articles.title: Singapore announces bid to host World Athletics Championships in 2025 - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Singapore is bidding to host the World Athletics Championships in 2025, Sport Singapore (SportSG) announced on Thursday (Mar 17). 

If successful, this would be the first time the championships will be held in Southeast Asia. Previous hosts of th…

articles.title: Paramount invests RM10mil in e-commerce ecosystem Commerce.Asia - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Paramount Corp Bhd has invested RM10mil in e-commerce venture Commerce DotAsia Ventures Sdn Bhd (Commerce.Asia), in line with its strategy to diversify its revenue stream.

articles.title: Filipina NYC hate crime victim in stable condition - BusinessMirror

articles.title: AirAsia Ride Launches LadiesONLY Female-Exclusive E-Hailing Service - Lowyat.NET
articles.description: E-hailing platform AirAsia Ride has just added a new service called LadiesONLY, which is ride-hailing done by women and for women.
articles.content: E-hailing platform AirAsia Ride is adding a new service called LadiesONLY that, as you can guess from its name, is ride-hailing done by women, for women. The female-exclusive service is actually just… [+1460 chars]
